item.title: Unveiling the Performance of A Movie Rental Business: An SQL Analysis
item.description: I was tasked with a vital project to analyze the performance of our Movie Rental Business, with a focus on providing valuable insights for potential acquirers and enhancing our companyâ€™s ability to showcase its strengths. Through detailed SQL queries, I aimed to deliver a clear and compelling picture of the business’s operational health and financial performance. 1. Understanding Our Customer Base To begin with, I tackled the challenge of understanding our customer base.

item.title: Streamlining Scholarship Management with Excel: A Success Story
item.description: I was given an exciting challenge by my professor: to create an Excel sheet that could support a department at the University of South Florida. I saw this as a perfect opportunity to make a real impact, so I decided to propose my project to the USF Scholarship Department. I knew that managing and updating student scholarships had been a huge task for them, filled with the complexities of recalculating amounts, adjusting for GPA changes, and maintaining accuracy across various files.
